thread.title_full: Saido Berahino drug shock: FA banned him after failed test | Daily Mail Online

author: Matt Lawton For The Daily Mail
title: Saido Berahino drug shock: FA banned him after failed test | Daily Mail Online
text: Saido Berahino drug shock as it emerges striker was suspended for failing test during time at West Brom Saido Berahino is understood to have tested positive for a recreational drug Controversial forward tested positive in out-of-competition test in September He was playing for West Brom at the time but joined Stoke for Â£12m last month Stoke, the Football Association and Berahino's agent declined to comment The Potters were made aware of the situation prior to him completing transfer Published: 22:12 GMT, 2 February 2017 | Updated: 22:55 GMT, 2 February 2017 609 shares
